participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and eager to break free from parental constraints. Values friendship and enjoyment.
participant_1.background: i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. they're constantly on my back. i just want to have fun with my friends.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Frustrated and disillusioned with life. Struggling to balance responsibilities with personal happiness.
participant_2.background: i hate my job. my wife spends all my money. i am 40 years old. i am planning on getting a divorce. i work as a car salesman.
